buildCommand: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && . $HOME/.cargo/env && curl https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-pack/installer/init.sh -sSf | sh && npm run build
installCommand: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && . $HOME/.cargo/env && curl https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-pack/installer/init.sh -sSf | sh && npm install
